SPG STAFFER PENS OP-ED ON TRUMP TOWER MEETING: Daniel Hoffman, the vice president of intelligence and security at SPG, a lobbying firm that has expanded aggressively in Washington since Trump’s election, had an op-ed in The New York Times in Saturday’s print edition giving his take on the meeting between Donald Trump Jr., Paul Manafort, Jared Kushner and a trio of “Kremlin-connected Russians,” as he puts it.
